name: SecBrowse Secure Internet Browser v3
short_description: After the original developer abandoned the project, inspired by it I made a new browser continuing its legacy. Introducing SecBrowse. It uses a comprehensive threat database to stop phishing, hacking, and malware in its tracks. It is a total rewrite running on a WebKit-similar engine for ultra-fast performance and stellar security. It has a modern, easy-to-use interface and a secure, custom-written, and of course, open source plugin system. It uses a unique camoflauge system to make itself invisible to malware. It uses extremely strong open-source, NSA-proof encryption to keep your browsing private. Tor integration allows extra privacy on your command with no hassle. Coming soon!
summary: New developer. New software. The new version of StrikeDefend.
